text.section: Only a child placement agency may petition for guardianship under this subtitle.
A court may grant guardianship under this subtitle only for a minor.

A petitioner shall attach to a petition:
all written consents for the guardianship that the petitioner has; and
if applicable:
proof of guardianship or relinquishment of parental rights granted by an administrative, executive, or judicial body of a state or other jurisdiction; and
certification that the guardianship or relinquishment was granted in compliance with the jurisdiction's laws.
